casebody.data:
Kenneth J. OTTO, Sr.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 13, 2016.

David J. Reich, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Kenneth J. Otto, Sr.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 161 Conn.App. 210, 136 A.3d 14 (2015), is denied.
